div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 610 Pescarii (formerly Coronini), c. 67 km. W of Turnu Severin, Rumania, 1895 Burial: 2nd-1st cent. B.C. (T) Contents: 178 AR. Found in bronze vase Apollonia., Illyria: dr. Dyrrhachium: dr. Disposition: Budapest 59; Vîrset 2; Timi- soara 1 Milleker, Délm 1 (1896), p. 27 Berkeszi, TRÉ 23 (1907), pp. 12-3
